lead_paragraph: GROVE--Andrew S. The City College of New York mourns the passing of its distinguished alumnus Andrew S. Grove, Class of 1960. Dr. Grove was an outstanding and loyal son of CCNY who left his alma mater with a BS in chemical engineering to later change the world through his innovation and leadership at Intel Corp. He gave generously, too, giving CCNY its largest gift ever. The Grove School of Engineering at CCNY, named in his honor, stands as a world class testament to this great pioneer. The City College extends its sincerest condolences to the Grove family. Lisa S. Coico, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GROVE, ANDREW S
